title: Floodplains are nutrient-rich and grow crops well

content.prompt: Which of the following is the best explanation of the fact that agricultural production on floodplains is often relatively high?

choices.label: On floodplains, soils tend to be nutrient-rich and fertile.
On floodplains, high water tables make irrigation unnecessary.
Periodic flooding leaches toxic pollutants out of floodplain soils.
Periodic flooding prevents the pH of floodplain soils from becoming too high.
Floodplains are usually sparsely settled and thus more acreage is available for agriculture.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
